an3.77:1.1: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami …pe… ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
an3.77:1.3: Kittavata nu kho, bhante, bhavo hoti”ti?
an3.77:2.1: “Kamadhatuvepakkanca, ananda, kammam nabhavissa, api nu kho kamabhavo pannayetha”ti?
an3.77:2.3: “Iti kho, ananda, kammam khettam, vinnanam bijam, tanha sneho.
an3.77:2.4: Avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam hinaya dhatuya cetana patitthita patthana patitthita evam ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti.
an3.77:3.1: Rupadhatuvepakkanca, ananda, kammam nabhavissa, api nu kho rupabhavo pannayetha”ti?
an3.77:3.3: “Iti kho, ananda, kammam khettam, vinnanam bijam, tanha sneho.
an3.77:3.4: Avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam majjhimaya dhatuya cetana patitthita patthana patitthita evam ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti.
an3.77:4.1: Arupadhatuvepakkanca, ananda, kammam nabhavissa, api nu kho arupabhavo pannayetha”ti?
an3.77:4.3: “Iti kho, ananda, kammam khettam, vinnanam bijam, tanha sneho.
an3.77:4.4: Avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam panitaya dhatuya cetana patitthita patthana patitthita evam ayatim punabbhavabhinibbatti hoti.
